topic.title: UZF GWT: Activate Flow Model Packages

para.text: UZF GWT: Activate Flow Model Packages

There are two boundary conditions in the flow model: specified heads of 1.625 m in the bottom layer in the first and last columns and infiltration of 0.1 m/day in the UZF package in the top layer of the model. Activate the CHD and UZF packages in the "Model|MODFLOW Packages and Programs" dialog box. In the UZF package, set the number of trailing waves to 15.
